revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 30:;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Horos, grandson of Petheus, mother Sambathion, drachmas 8, obols 27;;Orsenouphis, son of Pakysis, grandson of Artemidoros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 12 copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 4, obols 27;;Levas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 8;;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolemas, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Achillas, grandson of Onnophris, mother Didymarion, drachmas 8;;Esouris, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Chareidion, daughter of Chairemon (Chairemon, sackweaver);orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 7, 3 obols, tax on olive-produce drachma 1, 3 1/2 obols, naubion 4 1/2 obols; ;surcharges drachmas 2, 2 chalkoi, eparourion drachmas 6 obols 4 1/2, kollybos obols 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 3 1/2 chalkoi 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 18 obols 3 1/2, surcharges drachma 1 chalkoi 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 5 1/2 chalkoi 2;;in total for the day drachmas 164 obols 19;;(Phamenoth) 20 likewise:;Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanais, drachmas 4;;Anchophis, son of Petheus, grandson of Anchophis, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 8;;Aphrodisios, son, mother Menanous, drachmas 8;;for the 12th year Harpagathes, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Tasiaipis, copper drachmas 4, obols 28;;Teos, son of Mysthes, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tanais, obols 28;;Mystharion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petesouchos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203);orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on olive produce obols 2 chalkoi 2, naubion obol 1 1/2 obol, surcharges obols 3 1/2 chalkoi 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 1/2 chalkoi 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalkoi 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1, surcharges obols 2 1/2, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 56, obols 6;;(Pharmouthi) 21 likewise:;Agathopous, slave of Taseus alias Thaisarion, drachmas 8;;Theabennis, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Thebennis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Isidoros, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petheus, mother Euphrosyne, drachmas 16;;Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Didyme, daughter of Herakleides (Petsiris, son of Kophos);naubion for the katoikoi of the 13th year obols 2, surcharges chalkoi 2, kollybos chalkoi 2;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Sabeina, daughter of Apollonios;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5 obol 1 1/2, tax on olive produce obols 4 1/2, naubion obols 3 1/2, chalkoi 2, surcharges drachma 1, obols 2; ;eparourion drachmas 3, obols 3, surcharges obol 1 1/2, chalkoi 2, kollybos obol 1, chalkoi 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 5, chalkoi 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 13, obol 1/2. chalkoi 2, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 13, obols 5 1/2, chalkoi 2;;Petheus, son of Nestosiris;;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1, obols 3 1/2, tax on olive produce obol 1 1/2, naubion obol1;;surcharges obols 2 1/2, eparourion drachma 1 1/2, surcharges obol 1/2, chalkoi 2, kollybos obol 1/2, in total drachmas 3, obols 4 1/2, chalkoi 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3, obol 5 1/2, surcharges obols 1 1/2, in total drachmas 4, obol 1;;Belles, son of Nestosiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1, obols 3 1/2, tax on olive produce obol 1 1/2, naubion obol1, surcharges obols 2 1/2;;eparourion drachma 1 1/2, surcharges obol 1/2, chalkoi 2, kollybos obol 1/2, in total drachmas 3, obols 4 1/2, chalkoi 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3, obol 5 1/2, surcharges obols 1 1/2, in total drachmas 4, obol 1."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion); BL III, 113 (on l.1312) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
